fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Books: Learn an Order and non-Order role that is present in the game (Susceptible).  [Activates D2] 
- Scribe: You learn the role of the player you vote for during the Investigation Event. If you vote for multiple people, you will randomly learn the role of one of them (Susceptible).

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scrutinize: Pick 2 players that arenâ€™t yourself. Learn if they share the same faction at the end of the phase. (Uncertain). [2 uses, 2 CD, Astral, Unlocks D2]
- Study: Pick a player. Learn if they are one of the roles you learned in your Books passive at the end of the phase (Susceptible). [2 uses, 4 CD, Astral, Unlocks D2]
- Research: Gain a non-Special Item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
